mapper.sql: id, code, name, sex, national_id, province, city, birthday, education_name, political_name, speciality, height, marriage_id, hukou, school_date, mobile, address, department_name, job_id, comment, photo
mapper.select:
SELECT
from people_contract where name = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, s.name as national_name, t.province, t.city, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.speciality, t.height, t.marriage_id, m.name as marriage_name, t.hukou, t.school_date, t.mobile, t.address, t.department_name, t.job_id, j.job_level as job_name, t.comment, t.photo FROM people_contract t LEFT JOIN dict_national s ON s.id = t.national_id LEFT JOIN dict_marriage m ON m.id = t.marriage_id LEFT JOIN job j ON j.id = t.job_id
t.id = #{id}

select
from people_contract where name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into people_contract ( code, name, sex, national_id, province, city, birthday, education_name, political_name, speciality, height, marriage_id, hukou, school_date, mobile, address, department_name, job_id, comment, photo) values ( #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{nationalId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday, jdbcType=DATE}, #{educationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{politicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speciality, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriageId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hukou, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{schoolDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into people_contract ( code, name, sex, national_id, province, city, birthday, education_name, political_name, speciality, height, marriage_id, hukou, school_date, mobile, address, department_name, job_id, comment, photo ) values
( #{item.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.nationalId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.province, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.city, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.birthday, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.educationName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.politicalName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.speciality, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.height, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.marriageId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.hukou, jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.schoolDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.jobId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update people_Contract
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT},
national_id = #{nationalId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
education_name = #{educationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
political_name = #{politicalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speciality = #{speciality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
marriage_id = #{marriageId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
hukou = #{hukou, jdbcType=TINYINT},
school_date = #{schoolDate,jdbcType=DATE},
mobile = #{mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_name = #{departmentName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
job_id = #{jobId, jdbcType=INTEGER},
comment = #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, t.province, t.city, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.speciality, t.height, t.marriage_id, t.hukou, t.school_date, t.mobile, t.address, t.department_name, t.job_id, t.comment, t.photo from people_contract t where id in
#{item}

SELECT t.id, t.code, t.name, t.sex, t.national_id, s.name as national_name, t.province, t.city, t.birthday, t.education_name, t.political_name, t.speciality, t.height, t.marriage_id, m.name as marriage_name, t.hukou, t.school_date, t.mobile, t.address, t.department_name, t.job_id, j.job_level as job_name, t.comment, t.photo FROM people_contract t LEFT JOIN dict_national s ON s.id = t.national_id LEFT JOIN dict_marriage m ON m.id = t.marriage_id LEFT JOIN job j ON j.id = t.job_id where t.id in
#{item}
